channel.title: Joris Rijsdijk on Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Joris Rijsdijk on Portfolio

item.title: University Projects
item.description: I started studying at TU Delft in september 2020, and I have worked on many projects for courses since then. This is a collection of my proudest work related to computer graphics from my time at university. All other projects listed on my portfolio were made in my free time. Pizzicato A serious game developed in 10 weeks with 4 other peers in collaboration with Psychology researchers, during which I was Game Designer and Programmer.
